title: How to Throw a Pillsbury Doughboy Themed Party

steps.headline: Purchase blue and white plates and cups.
steps.description: You may also purchase Pillsbury Doughboy plates and cups, but they will be more expensive.

steps.headline: Bake a cake.
steps.description: Vanilla is best, as the white will coordinate with the Doughboy's color. Blue icing as a backdrop to an icing Doughboy outline on the top would work well.

steps.headline: Plan to play "Pin the hat on the Doughboy" if this is to be a party for younger children.
steps.description: Make or purchase appropriate game playing equipment.

steps.headline: Purchase a Doughboy note pad and print your invitations on the sheets.
Deliver or mail out the invitations to people on your guest list.
Create or purchase Chef Hats for each guest.
Create a Doughboy pinata and fill it with candy.

text: Purchase blue and white plates and cups. You may also purchase Pillsbury Doughboy plates and cups, but they will be more expensive. Bake a cake. Vanilla is best, as the white will coordinate with the Doughboy's color. Blue icing as a backdrop to an icing Doughboy outline on the top would work well. Plan to play "Pin the hat on the Doughboy" if this is to be a party for younger children. Make or purchase appropriate game playing equipment. Create your guest list.  Purchase a Doughboy note pad and print your invitations on the sheets.  Deliver or mail out the invitations to people on your guest list.  Create or purchase Chef Hats for each guest.  Purchase Doughboy related party favors.  Create a Doughboy pinata and fill it with candy.
